CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1946, pg. 9, reads: "Throngs Expected at Beauty Shop Owners' Revue - Last Call for Glamour!  April 9 is the date set for the annual Beauty Shop Owners' Association fashion revue at Schenley High School and all the lovely ladies and kiddies above will appear in the the show which promises to be the best yet... Center picture shows the youngest set: Carol Vaughn, Henrietta Tate, Catherine Woods, Betty Dellhan, Brendine Presseley, Janet Green, Evelyn Woods, Sander Jean... - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Carol Vaughn, Henrietta Tate, Catherine Woods, Betty Dellhan, Brendine Presseley, Janet Green, Evelyn Woods, and Sander Jean gathered on steps of Wesley Center AME Zion Church, Centre Avenue, Hill District
